title: Foreword
content:
This handbook serves as a study guide for those preparing to be accepted into church fellowship.
   The 52 lessons are divided into four sections of 13lessons each. The lessons can be studied in conjunction with regular Sabbath School Lessons. In each section, the 13th lesson is a review lesson for the previous 12 Bible studies.

 This manual serves as a study guide for large and small groups. The lessons are also geared towards those who wish to study the great truths of the Scriptures.

 May those who study these lessons become "wise unto salvation" (2 Timothy 3:15).
